title: Up Close and Personal
description: FROM NEW YORK TIMES BESTSELLING AUTHOR...Homicide detective Jordan Sampson turns to the good old days of high school to escape the trials of her everyday life. From her rollercoaster relationship with her teenage daughter to her overbearing ex-husband, Jordan has her hands full. Attending her fifteen-year reunion, Jordan hopes that reminiscing the past will help her cope with the present.Things start off well as old acquaintances reconnect and buried feelings for sweetheart Clint Cooper make a surprising reappearance. However, emotions of another kind linger stealthily through the the hunger for revenge. Murder darkens the atmosphere as members of Jordanâ€™s old cheerleading squad are poached by a hungry killer. As the last cheerleader standing, Jordan hunts after clues that will lead her to the person that wants her dead. Will she catch the killer before vengeance strikes again?
author: Carla Cassidy
